alert.note: Alert for Custer; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong outflow from thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Perkins, southeastern Keith, Lincoln, Logan, southeastern McPherson and west central Custer Counties through 630 PM CDT/530 PM MDT/... At 600 PM CDT/500 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Arnold to near Wallace. Movement was northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Stapleton, Sutherland, Hershey, Paxton, Wallace, Maxwell, Gandy, Dickens, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, Sarben, Ringgold, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, North Platte Airport, Roscoe, Keith, Logan, O`Fallons, Tarboz Lake and Shanklin Bluff. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 214 and 247. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 22. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 134 and 194. Highway 83 between mile markers 67 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins
